snippet: The United Nations announced that it had selected its first unarmed surveillance drone, an Italian-made plane that will be tried out by peacekeepers.
abstract: United Nations announces that it has selected its first unarmed surveillance drone, Italian-made plane that will be tried out by peacekeepers in Democratic Republic of Congo.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations announced that it had selected its first unarmed surveillance drone, an Italian-made plane that will be tried out by peacekeepers.

headline.main: Congo: U.N. Mission to Get Drones
headline.print_headline: Congo: U.N. Mission to Get Drones
